item.name: Tractor Deed
item.description: A promotional package from Joja Heavy Industries. Use this to construct a Tractor Garage immediately.
mail.content: Congratulation Farmer!^You have been selected for a free trial of our heavy machinery.^Enclosed is a prepaid deed for one Tractor Garage.^Just hold the can and use it to select your construction site.^^   - Joja Heavy Industries
